channel.title: Pages on f0xtek - Cloud Offensive Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on f0xtek - Cloud Offensive Notes

item.title: About
item.description:
I’m a cloud engineer pivoting into offensive security and red teaming.

This site is my working notebook for:

  • AWS and Kubernetes attack labs
  • CRTO preparation and notes
  • Detection engineering and purple-team ideas

Posts are written as attack → detection → mitigation stories, not just proofs-of-concept.
